column1: Adalgrim Took was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Adalgrim was the only child of Hildigrim Took and Rosa Baggins. He had five children
column2: four of them daughters. His youngest children were Paladin Took II and Esmeralda Took

column1: Adalgrim comes from the Germanic elements adal meaning "noble" and grim meaning "fierce" or "face".
